title: Year of Celebration and Rededication, 2026
summary: Proclamation 11007, issued by the President on January 29, 2026, declares 2026 as the Year of Celebration and Rededication, marking the 250th anniversary of American independence. The proclamation emphasizes the nation's founding principles of liberty and equality, rooted in the Declaration of Independence. It calls for Americans to reflect on their history, honor past generations, and rededicate themselves to the cause of liberty and justice. The text highlights key historical moments and figures that exemplify the American spirit, from the Revolutionary War to modern achievements, and encourages widespread participation in commemorative activities throughout the year.
